claim_summary: The Pathway to Prosperity amendment states that in January 2025 DHS will pay QHPs an average monthly premium of $577.62, advanced cost sharing reduction payments of $202.17 per month and wrap‑around payments of $4.53 per month for a total per‑member‑per‑month of $784.31【442060796995469†L2007-L2012】.

source.title: Request to Amend the ARHOME Section 1115 Demonstration – Pathway to Prosperity
